message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think you'll really love it! I'm looking for $120 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I'm definitely interested, but $120 is a bit steep for me.  Would you be willing to come down to $100?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I can meet you halfway between $120 and $100, so I'm willing to offer it to you for $110. What do you think?
